columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PAT_REL_NAME
columns.description: The name of the patient's contact.

columns.name: PAT_REL_CITY
columns.description: Contact's city of residence

columns.name: PAT_REL_ZIP
columns.description: The ZIP code of the patient's contact.

columns.name: PAT_REL_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Contact's county of residence


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PAT_REL_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Contact's country of residence


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PAT_REL_HOME_PHONE
columns.description: Contact's home phone

columns.name: PAT_REL_WORK_PHONE
columns.description: Contact's work phone

columns.name: PAT_REL_MOBILE_PHNE
columns.description: Contact's mobile phone

columns.name: PAT_REL_LGL_GUAR_YN
columns.description:
Whether this contact is the patient's legal guardian


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: PAT_REL_REC_LINK_ID
columns.description: Links this contact to a patient record

columns.name: PAT_REL_RELATION_C_NAME
columns.description:
Contact's relation to patient


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PAT_REL_PRIM_PH_C_NAME
columns.description:
Which of the contact's phone numbers should be considered primary


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Home phone


Work phone


Mobile phone

columns.name: PAT_REL_GEN_STR_1
columns.description: Customer labeled string item

columns.name: PAT_REL_GEN_STR_2
columns.description: Customer labeled string item

columns.name: PAT_REL_GEN_STR_3
columns.description: Customer labeled string item

columns.name: PAT_REL_GEN_STR_4
columns.description: Customer labeled string item

columns.name: PAT_REL_GEN_CAT_1_C_NAME
columns.description:
Customer labeled category item


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PAT_REL_GEN_CAT_2_C_NAME
columns.description:
Customer labeled category item


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PAT_REL_GEN_CAT_3_C_NAME
columns.description:
Customer labeled category item


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PAT_REL_GEN_CAT_4_C_NAME
columns.description:
Customer labeled category item


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PAT_REL_HOUSE_NUM
columns.description: Contact's House Number

columns.name: PAT_REL_DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The district category ID for the patient's contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PAT_REL_HEARING_YN
columns.description:
Capture if patient's relative has hearing impairment


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PAT_REL_LGL_GUAR_YN

columns.name: PAT_REL_VISUALLY_YN
columns.description:
Capture if patient's relative has visual impairment


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PAT_REL_LGL_GUAR_YN

columns.name: PAT_REL_IMP_NEEDS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Capture the patient's emergency contact's special needs for hearing and visual impairment.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PAT_REL_SPOKEN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Capture the patient's emergency contact's spoken language.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PAT_REL_WRITTEN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Capture the patient's emergency contact's written language.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PAT_REL_SPOKEN_C_NAME

columns.name: PAT_REL_PREF_LANG_C_NAME
columns.description:
Capture the patient's emergency contact's preferred language.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PAT_REL_SPOKEN_C_NAME

columns.name: PAT_REL_INTERPRET_YN
columns.description:
Capture if the patient's emergency contact needs an interpreter.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: PAT_REL_SPL_NEEDS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Capture the patient's emergency contact's special needs.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PAT_REL_NOTIFY_YN
columns.description:
Capture if the patient's emergency contact should be notified on patient's admission.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PAT_REL_INTERPRET_YN

columns.name: PAT_LEGAL_REL_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies the category for the legal relationship


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Health Care Agent


First Alternate Health Care Agent


Second Alternate Health Care Agent

columns.name: PAT_REL_ACT_AGNT_YN
columns.description:
Specifies if the health care agent is active or not


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PAT_REL_INTERPRET_YN

columns.name: PAT_REL_EMAIL
columns.description: Primary email address of the patient's emergency contact.

columns.name: PAT_REL_RLA_ID
columns.description: Links this patient contact to the associated Patient Relationships (RLA) patient relationship record.
